Name: Daniela Pereda
Bio: Hi, I'm Dani Pereda! I am excited to serve as president of this year's FYEC, where I hope to broaden the opportunities available to freshman engineers through academic, social, and service-oriented experiences. I am originally from Cincinnati, Ohio, but I currently live in Johnson Family Hall. Outside of engineering, I love cooking, running, and spending time with friends and family!

Name: Emily Kim
Bio: Emily is a freshman Chemical Engineering major with an intended minor in Bioengineering. Originally from Seoul, South Korea, she is a proud member of Lewis Hall. As secretary of FYEC, Emily is excited to launch weekly newsletters to keep all information and activities organized and accessible. Outside of FYEC, Emily is an active member of the Biotech ND, enableND, AIChE, and iGEM. She also loves to go on side quests, such as participating in the First-Year Case Competition or joining friends in finger painting at a residence hall across campus.
